name: Turbo Rail 2000
description:
Fast paced, rail based.

Turbo Rail 2000 is a fast-paced side-scroller. 

The aim is to get your train from the start station, to a complete stop at the end station through a variety of puzzles and challenges. Play through 8 distinct levels, based on Sheffield and Tokyo and 2 unique trains, the Intercity 125 and the Shinkansen.

Controls:

Right arrow: Accelerate
Left arrow: Decelerate
Space: Brake
R: Reset Level

OS Support

Mac OS X
Windows
Linux (coming soon)
